channel.title: [PI] How do I make items stackable when they are dropped by a monster?
channel.description: I added this into my NpcConstants.TSM: [code]269 4278 4278 4278 4278 4278 275 995 995 995 995 995[/code] When I killed the monster (id 269), it dropped the stackable items above like this: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/azezkm.png[/img]
